includedAssets.title: Pilot
includedAssets.synopsis: Gripping series from the writer of Scream. An ex-FBI agent (Kevin Bacon) is recalled when a killer (James Purefoy) escapes from jail.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Gripping series from the writer of Scream. An ex-FBI agent (Kevin Bacon) is recalled when a killer (James Purefoy) escapes from jail.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Gripping series from the writer of Scream. An ex-FBI agent (Kevin Bacon) is recalled when a killer (James Purefoy) escapes from jail.

includedAssets.title: Chapter Two
includedAssets.synopsis: The hunt is on for Joey, but can Hardy keep the youngster and his mother safe from Carroll's army of acolytes?
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: The hunt is on for Joey, but can Hardy keep the youngster and his mother safe from Carroll's army of acolytes?
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: The hunt is on for Joey, but can Hardy keep the youngster and his mother safe from Carroll's army of acolytes?

includedAssets.title: The Poet's Fire
includedAssets.synopsis: Carroll uses his allies to settle some personal scores, while the FBI battle to halt a tenacious follower.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Carroll uses his allies to settle some personal scores, while the FBI battle to halt a tenacious follower.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Carroll uses his allies to settle some personal scores, while the FBI battle to halt a tenacious follower.

includedAssets.title: Mad Love
includedAssets.synopsis: As Maggie plots to get rid of Hardy, tensions rise when a jealous Paul lets Emma in on a secret.

includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: As Maggie plots to get rid of Hardy, tensions rise when a jealous Paul lets Emma in on a secret.

includedAssets.title: The Siege
includedAssets.synopsis: Claire and Hardy get a lead on Joey, while Carroll seeks a lawyer from his past to send a deadly message.

includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Claire and Hardy get a lead on Joey, while Carroll seeks a lawyer from his past to send a deadly message.

includedAssets.title: The Fall
includedAssets.synopsis: A new follower reveals Carroll's true intentions, while Ryan works to turn Emma, Jacob and Paul against each other.

includedAssets.title: Let Me Go
includedAssets.synopsis: When Carroll asks attorney Olivia to help him transfer to a new facility, Ryan tries to figure out his wider plan.

includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: When Carroll asks attorney Olivia to help him transfer to a new facility, Ryan tries to figure out his wider plan.

includedAssets.title: Welcome Home
includedAssets.synopsis: With both Carroll and Joey still missing, Ryan is furious when the FBI brings in a new agent to lead the case.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: With both Carroll and Joey still missing, Ryan is furious when the FBI brings in a new agent to lead the case.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: With both Carroll and Joey still missing, Ryan is furious when the FBI brings in a new agent to lead the case.

includedAssets.title: Love Hurts
includedAssets.synopsis: As Hardy and Parker continue their search, Carroll makes it clear that Claire's safety is under threat.

includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: As Hardy and Parker continue their search, Carroll makes it clear that Claire's safety is under threat.

includedAssets.title: Guilt
includedAssets.synopsis: When Joe discovers Claire's location, Ryan must work to stay one step ahead of the killer and his followers.

includedAssets.synopsis: While Claire adjusts to life at the followers' mansion, Ryan and Parker try to get back on track.

includedAssets.synopsis: In the season finale, Ryan races to stop Joe Carroll before his deadly plan can be realised.

includedAssets.title: Season 1
includedAssets.synopsis: Retired FBI agent Ryan Hardy (Kevin Bacon) attempts to recapture psychotic serial killer Joe Carroll (James Purefoy), who has created a cult of fanatical followers to spread his message and carry out his deadly plans. First season of the US psychological horror thriller.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: A retired FBI agent tries to recapture a psychotic serial killer with a cult of fanatical followers. Psychological horror thriller with Kevin Bacon.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Retired FBI agent Ryan Hardy (Kevin Bacon) attempts to recapture psychotic serial killer Joe Carroll (James Purefoy), who has created a cult of fanatical followers to spread his message and carry out his deadly plans. First season of the US psychological horror thriller.

includedIn.title: The Following

includedIn.mediumSynopsis: A retired FBI agent attempts to recapture a psychotic serial killer who has created a cult of fanatical followers to spread his message and carry out his deadly plans.
